DOC.brief_summary: To assess bioequivalence esomeprazole TEST product vs. REFERENCE product healthy volunteer reside Taiwan .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Evaluate Bioequivalence Test Formulation Compared Equivalent Dose Reference Drug Product
DOC.detailed_description: This study design assess bioequivalence esomeprazole TEST product vs. REFERENCE product healthy volunteer reside Taiwan . Bioequivalence assume 90 % confidence interval AUC0-t , AUC0-inf Cmax ratio within 80-125 % interval log-transformed value .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy adult , age 20 40 year old . 2 . Physically mentally healthy subject confirm interview , medical history , clinical examination , laboratory test , chest xray electrocardiogram . 3 . The normal range body mass index 18.5 25 . 4 . Normal laboratory determination result include : SGOT ( AST ) , SGPT ( ALT ) , albumin , glucose , creatinine , uric acid , cholesterol , TG , Î³GT , alkaline phosphatase , total bilirubin , BUN , HBsAg , AntiHCV AntiHIV test . 5 . Normal hematology result include : hemoglobin , hematocrit , WBC count differential , RBC count platelet count . 6 . Normal urinalysis result include : glucose , protein , RBC , WBC , epith , cast bacteria . 7 . Female subject : use adequate contraception since last menstruation plan conception study . nonlactating . negative pregnancy test ( urine ) within 14 day prior study . 8 . Informed consent form sign . 1 . A history drug alcohol abuse past 24 week . 2 . Sensitivity analogous drug . 3 . A clinically significant illness ( significant unintentional weight loss , recurrent vomiting , dysphagia , haematemesis , melaena gastric ulcer ) within past 4 week . 4 . Evidence clinical significant renal , cardiovascular , hepatic , hematopoetic , neurological , pulmonary gastrointestinal pathology within past 4 week . 5 . Planed vaccination time course study . 6 . Participation clinical investigation last 60 day . 7 . Regular use medication last 4 week . 8 . Single use medication last 2 week . 9 . Blood donation 250 mL within past 12 week . 10 . Individuals judge investigator coinvestigator undesirable subject .
